title: SCP issues updates on technology driven citizen centric justice sector reforms
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 25 (APP):The Supreme Court of Pakistan has issued a comprehensive update on its ongoing technology driven, citizen centric justice sector reforms under the Judicial leadership of the country, highlighting key advancements in judicial efficiency, technological modernization, and public facilitation.

The reforms focus on digitization of case management, e-filing, online cause lists, and real-time case tracking to enhance transparency and access to justice.

Detailed updates on these initiatives are available on the Supreme Courtâ€™s official website: www.supremecourt.gov.pk
